drone.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make a continuous low dull sound
drone.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a male bee that does no work
drone.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: someone who has a good life but does not work to earn it or give anything back to society
drone.translation[1].definitions[3].defi: an aircraft that does not have a pilot, but is operated by radio
